answers.GET_YOUR_ANSWERS_IN_EASY_WAY: Get your answers in an easy way
answers.ORGANIC_FOOD_ANSWER: The company recommends Cadilac pesticide. The Cadillac pesticide works by contact and has a protective effect, so it should be sprayed before the infection appears or once the symptoms of the infection appear.
answers.SYNTHETIC_CHEMICALS_QUESTION: What is an effective compound to eliminate spiders?
answers.SYNTHETIC_CHEMICALS_ANSWER: Kanemite is the most powerful compound in the Egyptian market to control plant mites Kanemite controls all phases of mites (egg - nymph - whole mite) 'Use recommendation: 1 cm/L water.
answers.PESTICIDES_AND_FERTILIZERS_QUESTION: How do we compensate for the loss of nutrients in the soil?
answers.PESTICIDES_AND_FERTILIZERS_ANSWER: By using a fertilizer that in turn increases the quality and productivity of crops and thus increases production. Studies have shown that fertilizer contributes to the increment of agricultural crop productivity by at least 50% in the twentieth century.

about.ABOUT_INFO: At UNIFERT MISR, We are dedicated to serve the needs of Egyptian farmers. We are committed to delivering cutting-edge technologies and innovations across a spectrum of agriculture inputs, encompassing Seeds, Crop Nutrition, Plant Protection products, and Post-harvest solutions. Our dedication lies in fostering agricultural success by providing the latest, most effective solutions tailored to the evolving landscape of Egyptian agriculture. With a vision to be recognized as the Preferred Supplier, we strive to adapt proactively to the dynamic shifts propelled by market forces and challenges posed by climate change
about.EXPERIENCE_DESC: Since its inception, UNIFERT MISR has been deeply rooted in agriculture. We acknowledge the escalating need for increased food production to sustain a growing global population, coupled with challenges such as limited arable lands and worsening climatic conditions due to global warming. In light of these harsh realities, humanity is compelled to enhance yields and cultivate more efficient farming practices. Our mission statement perfectly aligns with these imperatives:
about.EXPERIENCE_DESC2: “Delivering comprehensive solutions to the agricultural sector”
about.EXPERIENCE_DESC3: By solutions, we do not just mean products; we encompass logistical services and, more significantly, leverage our expertise to assist both our customers and growers in navigating these challenges

PARTNER_DETAILS.name: Bayer
PARTNER_DETAILS.description: Bayer is a German company. Bayer’s leadership in agriculture provides tailored solutions for farmers to plant, grow, and protect their harvests using less land, water, and energy.

WELCOME_MESSAGE: Welcome to the Unifert Egypt website
YEARS_OF_SERVICE: 50 years in serving agriculture in Egypt
ABOUT_DESCRIPTION: At UNIFERT MISR, We are dedicated to serve the needs of Egyptian farmers. We are committed to delivering cutting-edge technologies and innovations across a spectrum of agriculture inputs, encompassing Seeds, Crop Nutrition, Plant Protection products, and Post-harvest solutions. Our dedication lies in fostering agricultural success by providing the latest, most effective solutions tailored to the evolving landscape of Egyptian agriculture. With a vision to be recognized as the Preferred Supplier, we strive to adapt proactively to the dynamic shifts propelled by market forces and challenges posed by climate change.
FEED_THE_WORLD_TITLE: WE HELP YOU TO FEED THE WORLD
FEED_THE_WORLD_DESCRIPTION: Since Unifert’s birth, Agriculture has been at the heart of our activities. We believe the world will need more and more food to feed an ever-increasing population while the availability of new arable lands remains constricted and climatic conditions worsen due to the effects of global warming. These hard realities will force humanity to improve yields and develop more efficient farming processes.
LAND_CARE_TITLE: Land Will Have The Suitable Care
CROP_BLOOM_TITLE: Your Crop Will Bloom and Flourish
PARTNERS_DESCRIPTION: Through shared dedication to excellence, innovation, and sustainable practices, our strategic partnerships play a crucial role in supporting our mission to provide top-quality solutions for the agricultural industry.
FERTILIZERS_DESCRIPTION: We offer a variety of premium fertilizers crafted to nourish and promote robust plant growth. Our diverse selection includes high-quality fertilizers tailored to meet the specific nutritional requirements of various plants. Recognizing the uniqueness of each agricultural process, our aim is to supply you with the appropriate fertilizers to ensure the thriving health of your plants.
SEEDS_DESCRIPTION: Explore our extensive selection of top-tier seeds to fuel your agricultural pursuits. Whether you are a seasoned cultivator or a novice, our thoughtfully assembled assortment features a diverse range of premium seeds that ensure the cultivation of flavorful vegetables and fruits. With a dedication to quality, sustainability, and customer contentment, coupled with our on-site sales and technical support team, we strive to become your reliable go-to for all your seed requirements.
CROP_PROTECTION_DESCRIPTION: Within our Crop Protection category, we are dedicated to assisting you safeguard your crops and promoting the well-being of your plants. Recognizing the challenges confronted by gardeners and farmers in dealing with pests, diseases, and environmental stressors, we provide a variety of reliable and efficient crop protection solutions. Our dedication to quality, sustainability, and customer contentment underscores our endeavor to be your trusted partner in crop protection
EVENT_DESCRIPTION_1: We are pleased to take a moment to reflect on our participation in the Agri Plaza 2023 exhibition, its 4TH edition, which is held in Alexandria Governorate from October 31 to November 1. The event provided a platform for UNIFERT to showcase our expertise in the field of agriculture, interact with specialists in this field, and leave a lasting impression on visitors, including farmers, farm owners , factories as well as our partners . We are proud to share our most prominent experiences at the exhibition, which confirms our commitment to excellence and innovation in the field of agriculture.
EVENT_DESCRIPTION_2: As we reflect on the successful exhibition experience, we feel grateful for the support and enthusiasm shown by visitors and our partners in the success. This event has motivated us to strive for greater heights and continue to drive innovation in the areas of agriculture
EVENT_DESCRIPTION_3: We are passionate about the future and committed to delivering excellence and making a positive impact on agriculture which we are so passionate about.
